claim: Spider-Man has been portrayed by Tobey Maguire, Andrew Garfield, and Tom Holland in films.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In films , Spider-Man has been portrayed by actors Tobey Maguire  (  2002 -- 2007  )  and Andrew Garfield  (  2012 -- 2014  )  , while Tom Holland portrays the character in the Marvel Cinematic Universe , first appearing in Captain America : Civil War in 2016 .
